html:

We’re seeking a highly organized and proactive Administrative Assistant / Office Manager to support leading Sports Stylist, Courtney Mays. This position entails managing the day-to-day details that keep her creative process running smoothly.

Job Title: Administrative Assistant / Office Manager for Fashion Stylist
Location: Los Angeles, CA/New York, NY
Type: Part-Time
Start Date: ASAP

About the Role:
We’re seeking a highly organized and proactive Administrative Assistant / Office Manager to support leading Sports Stylist, Courtney Mays. This position entails managing the day-to-day details that keep her creative process running smoothly. This role is perfect for someone who loves fashion, thrives in fast-paced environments, and has a knack for organizing chaos into clarity.

Key Responsibilities:
● Track, organize, and file receipts and expenses
● Assist with market pulls, returns, and sample coordination
● Maintain an organized system for wardrobe, kits, supplies, and styling tools
● Coordinate calendar, appointments, and booking schedules
● Provide comprehensive support for travel planning and logistics
● Support in prepping and packing for styling jobs
● Liaise with PR showrooms and vendors for pulls and returns
● Keep track of upcoming shoots to ensure everything is ready ahead of time
● Maintain and improve overall workflow and organization

Ideal Candidate:
● Previous experience as an assistant, office manager, or coordinator (preferably in fashion or entertainment)
● Exceptionally organized and detail-oriented
● Strong communication skills and professional demeanor
● Able to anticipate needs and stay two steps ahead
● Comfortable with spreadsheets, Google Drive, and organizing digital files
● Discreet, trustworthy, and respectful of privacy
● A love for style, an eye for aesthetics, and an appreciation for the creative process

Bonus Points If You:
● Have experience working with stylists or in fashion production
● Are familiar with key PR contacts and showrooms
● Can help implement systems for streamlining workflows

How to Apply:
Please send your resume to courtney@thepmcollective.com. Feel free to include any relevant experience or links to portfolios/socials.

theonly.agency/artists/courtney-mays
@courtneydmays

MVPR IS SEEKING FASHION INTERNS IN LOS ANGELES & NEW YORK

MVPR are looking for detail oriented, enthusiastic interns to join our growing team. The ideal candidates have a passion for fashion, are interested in PR, up to date with digital trends and social media, work well in a fast-paced environment and have no problem running around LA and NY.

The Only Agency Is Hiring An Agent Assistant In Los Angeles

The Only Agency is seeking a highly motivated, detail-oriented, and proactive Assistant Agent based in Los Angeles to join our team and support the Director of Styling and Styling Agents in managing and cultivating artist relationships.
